#
# File generated by CMakeBuilder
#
#

#Create executable
IF( APPLE )
	MESSAGE( "Setting application bundle resources to Base.7z" )
	SET_SOURCE_FILES_PROPERTIES( Base.7z PROPERTIES MACOSX_PACKAGE_LOCATION Resources )
	ADD_EXECUTABLE ( ResourcesTest MACOSX_BUNDLE main.cpp Base.7z )
ELSE( NOT APPLE)

	ADD_EXECUTABLE ( ResourcesTest main.cpp )

ENDIF( APPLE )

#OBJECT_DEPENDS ( ResourceTest Core )
IF(NOT BUILD_SHARED_LIBS)
MESSAGE("Additional dependencies linkage for ResourceTest")
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ResourcesTest  ${Boost_LIBRARIES} ${STLPORT_LIBRARIES} ${SDL_LIBRARY} ${OPENGL_LIBRARY})
ENDIF(NOT BUILD_SHARED_LIBS)
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ResourcesTest FreyaCore)
